English:
You know Jimiken? They're just the most DEVILISH
indie band! You feel what I'm saying?
Chinese:
你知道吉米肯嗎？　雖然是獨立樂團，
但是就如“惡魔般”一樣厲害喔～～～～！！
……有傳達到嗎？　這份感覺。
Korean:
지미KEN이라고 알아? 인디즈 밴드인데
이게 또 엄청 "악마적"이야~~~~!!
……전해져? 이 필링
German:
Kennst du Jimiken? Das ist eine HÖLLISCH gute
Indie-Band! Kapierst du, was ich meine?

English:
Everyone's all about downloading and streaming
now. I dunno, I still like CDs. I just think it's
nice having the case and the lyrics sheet and all.
Chinese:
雖然最近，不管是什麼都可以用下載，
但我還是喜歡買CD～
不覺得看CD封面跟歌詞卡很有趣嗎？
Korean:
최근에는 뭐든지 다운로드하는 시대지만
나는 CD를 사는 게 좋아~
커버와 가사 카드를 보는 게 즐겁잖아?
German:
Alle sind jetzt nur noch am Runterladen und
Streamen. Also, ich mag CDs noch. Ich mag die
Hülle und die Songtexte und das alles.

English:
Jimikeeeen! What are us worthless followers
supposed to live for in a world without you?
Chinese:
吉米肯大人──！　在失去你的這個世界，
你的泥娃娃們，該用什麼來支撐
自己活下去呢──！？
Korean:
지미켄님-~ 당신이 없어진 이런 세계에서
당신의 밀랍 인형들은 무엇에 기대서 살아가야 하나요!?
German:
Jimikeeen! Wofür sollen wir armseligen Fans in
einer Welt ohne dich noch leben?

English:
You gotta keep some semblance of normal life at
times like these most of all! Wonder if there are
any good new bands in...
Chinese:
越是這種時候，越要過得和平常一樣！
好了～有沒有新的專輯呢！
Korean:
이럴 때야말로 평소처럼 지내야겠지!
그럼, 새로운 뮤지션은 없으려나!
German:
In solchen Zeiten muss man ganz besonders darauf
achten, etwas Normalität beizubehalten. Ob es
wohl irgendwelche guten neuen Bands gibt ...
